instruction: Summarize this article on the mathematics of movie production.
input: The mathematics of motion picture production is a complex mix of art, science and craft. The mathematics of bringing movies to life through production is studied by Hollywood professionals in order to understand the entire process of getting a film from the script and into theaters.
output: This article discusses the complicated and multi-faceted mathematics of creating a movie, from script-writing to actual production. Hollywood professionals use mathematics to understand and execute the various steps of the movie-making process.
